ingredients.ingredient: 2 large baking potatoes, scrubbed and patted dry
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided, or to taste
½ teaspoon salt-free seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®), or to taste

cookingTips: Slice potatoes evenly and not too thin to prevent burning and ensure proper cooking
Brush grill grates thoroughly with oil to prevent sticking
Cook over medium heat and turn frequently for even browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you achieve crispy exteriors while maintaining creamy interiors on thin potato slices?
